SEARCH
Module org.eclipse.persistence.sdo
Package commonj.sdo.impl

Class HelperProvider

java.lang.Object
commonj.sdo.impl.HelperProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
HelperProviderImpl
public abstract class HelperProvider extends Object
This class instantiates a HelperProviderImpl that returns concrete helpers. This class may be replaced by another implementation.
